Hi! My name is Solomon Eshun (he/him/his). My site is still under construction !! <!-- I am from Ghana, West Africa, and Iâ€™m currently pursuing a PhD. -->

My current research interests include causal inference, infectious disease modeling, data integration and machine learning. I am also interested in exploring high-dimensional inference, semiparametric models, and survival analysis as they apply to electronic health records and clinical trials. I aim to develop robust statistical methods and tools aimed at tackling complex problems in a range of public health issues including infectious diseases, cardiovascular diseases, cancer etc. I am committed to engaging with these topics through continual learning and academic exploration.
